mapper.insert:
insert into file
fileName=#{fileName},
fileType=#{fileType},
uploadDate=#{uploadDate},
uploadPerson=(select e.`Name` from employee as e where e.EmployeeID=#{uploadPersonId}),
appliComCode=#{appliComCode}, appliCom=(select name from sys_company where CompanyCode=#{appliComCode}),
summary=#{summary},
fileNameCode=#{fileNameCode}
mapper.select:
SELECT f.FileID, f.FileName, f.Summary, f.AppliCom, f.AppliComCode, f.UploadDate, f.UploadPerson, if(f.fileNameCode='',f.fileNameCode,concat(#{url},f.fileNameCode)) as fileNameCode FROM file AS f
and FileID = #{id}
